# dwctaxon

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of dwctaxon is to facilitate working with Darwin Core Taxon data.

## Installation

You can install dwctaxon from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("remotes")
remotes::install_github("joelnitta/dwctaxon")
```
